creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top center section of elaborate geometric embroidered circles and corner starbursts in red, green, yellow and white, surrounded on top and sides by rows of embroidery and applied tape in same colors and wide (3") green satin border; bottom section has two 5-1/2" embroidered squares surrounded by smaller squares and corners, all in black scroll embroidery with red and green highlights; 1" green side border and 1-1/2" black bottom border; blue lining
title: Baby Carrier
